name: PhotoStack Gallery
author: Savita at WPoets

sections.description:
This plguin is build to show photos from a gallery on any page. It is neeat way to show image gallery or work portfolio. This Plugin is inspired by blog on http://tympanus.net/codrops/2010/06/27/beautiful-photo-stack-gallery-with-jquery-and-css3/ and used css and javascript code from its demo files. Check live demo here.

This plugin is brought to you by WPoets development team.
sections.installation:
1. Upload photostack-gallary to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Now whenever you want to show gallery on any page add [show_gallery]
  4. More setting will come soon.

short_description: PhotoStack allows you to create fullpage ajaxified image gallery.
